ai-tha-ap243:1.1_0: “I used to have a small sea
ai-tha-ap243:1.2_0: “In the wilderness, I’m sitting in the wilderness,
ai-tha-ap243:1.3_0: After killing, they delight in the Joyful Gods.
ai-tha-ap243:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap243:2.4_0: this is the fruit, this is the rain.
ai-tha-ap243:3.3_0: I’ve realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
ai-tha-ap243:4.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Saviṭṭha.
